title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 220.3 - Violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 220.3 - Violations

State Regulations
(a) No telemarketer
or seller doing business in this state shall engage in any action that is
prohibited by section
399-z
of
the General Business Law or this Part. (b) All telemarketers and sellers doing
business in this state shall, as applicable, comply with all affirmative
requirements imposed by section
399-z
of
the General Business Law or this Part. (c) Each failure to act in accordance with
subdivision (a) or (b) of this section shall constitute a separate
violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
220.3

Adopted

New

York State Register February 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 6, eff. 2/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
